title: Tuna Noodle Casserole
directions: 1 Heat the oven to 400°F. Stir the soup, milk, pimientos, if desired, peas, tuna and noodles in a 1 1/2-quart casserole. Stir the bread crumbs and butter in a small bowl.
2 Bake the tuna mixture for 20 minutes or until hot and bubbling. Stir the tuna mixture. Sprinkle with the bread crumb mixture.
3 Bake for 5 minutes or until the bread crumb mixture is golden brown.
ingredients: 1 can (10 1/2 ounces) Campbell’s® Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup or (10 1/2 ounces) Campbell’s® Condensed 98% Fat Free Cream of Mushroom Soup
2 cans (about 5 ounces each) tuna in water, drained
4 ounces (about 2 cups) medium egg noodles, cooked and drained
